    • Method Detail

      • addLanguage

        public void addLanguage(String languageCode,
                        String name)
        Adds a new language or updates an existing language for the given code.
        Parameters:
        languageCode - The language code as LANGUAGE_COUNTY_VARIANT
        name - The name of the language (Should be the foreign name).

      • getAllLanguages

        public Map<String,String> getAllLanguages()
        Returns all languages for the client.
        Returns:
        Map of all language codes with their names.

      • getAvailableLanguages

        public Collection<Language> getAvailableLanguages()
        This method returns all available languages. In contrast to MasterDataManagement.getUsedLanguages() it will not include an inactive language of the current user. Will maintain the languages itself and not use the database.
        Returns:
        All languages which currently have at least one active localization.
        See Also:
        MasterDataManagement.getUsedLanguages()

      • getUsedLanguages

        public Collection<Language> getUsedLanguages()
        This method returns all available languages plus the language of the current user. For only retrieving the available languages use MasterDataManagement.getAvailableLanguages() Will use the database only for getting the language of the current user.
        Returns:
        All languages which currently have at least one active localization. Includes the current users language, even if there is no localization for it.
        See Also:
        MasterDataManagement.getAvailableLanguages()

      • isAvailableLanguage

        public boolean isAvailableLanguage(Locale locale)
        Description copied from interface: MasterDataManagement
        Test whether the language of the locale belongs to the available languages.
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale to test
        Returns:
        true if the language of the locale is among the available languages

      • removeLanguage

        public void removeLanguage(String languageCode)
        Removes the language for the given code.
        Parameters:
        languageCode - The code of the language to remove.
